title: Bloomberg Markets: Malik on Impact of Eclipse on Solar
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Malik on Impact of Eclipse on Solar
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Naureen S Malik Bloomberg Journalist Bloomberg Editorial Discussing the first total solar eclipse to sweep the U.S. from coast to coast in 99 years started to plunge broad swaths of the nation into darkness, the biggest test yet for the power grid since the rapid rise of renewable energy.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
